BriefDescription: Wall clock interval time in nanoseconds
Number of cores. A core consists of 1 or more thread, with each thread being associated with a logical Linux CPU
Number of logical Linux CPUs. There may be multiple such CPUs on a core
Number of online logical Linux CPUs. There may be multiple such CPUs on a core
Number of dies. Each die has 1 or more cores
Number of packages. Each package has 1 or more die
Number of functional units that in parallel can execute parts of an instruction
1 if simultaneous multithreading (aka hyperthreading) is enable otherwise 0
The amount a Time Stamp Counter (TSC) increases per second
